field_descriptions.interest_recipient: Address of interest recipient if different from the owner.
field_descriptions.owner: Address of the owner of the new deposit if different from the caller.
field_descriptions.to: Send the coins to this address instead of the caller, or the address of the owner of the deposit you are adding protection to (if different from you).
field_descriptions.commit_force_close: Commit a force-close of other person's deposit. Set to 1.
field_descriptions.challenge_force_close: Challenge a force-close of other person's deposit. Set to 1.
field_descriptions.weaker_id: ID of the weaker deposit when challenging a force-close.
field_descriptions.add_protection: Add protection to a deposit. Set to 1.
field_descriptions.withdraw_protection: Withdraw protection from a deposit. Set to 1.
